adobeanalyticsr 0.0.9525
  • Reference

Get list of dimensions

aa_get_dimensions.Rd

This will generate an extensive list of all the dimensions in the reportsuite.

aa_get_dimensions(
  rsid = Sys.getenv("AA_REPORTSUITE_ID"),
  locale = "en_US",
  segmentable = "false",
  reportable = "false",
  classifiable = "false",
  expansion = "tags,allowedForReporting,categories",
  company_id = Sys.getenv("AA_COMPANY_ID")
)

Arguments

rsid

Adobe report number
locale

language - default'en_US'
segmentable

- boolean - default TRUE
reportable

- boolean - default TRUE
classifiable

- boolean - default FALSE
expansion

options c('tags', 'allowedForReporting', 'categories'))
company_id

this can be either manually defined here or utilize the global definitions
